sentences.cn: …柴可夫斯基的《胡桃夹子》选段。

sentences.en: Can you excerpt something from the newspaper?
sentences.cn: 你能从报纸上选录些东西 吗 ?

sentences.cn: 约瑟夫. 康拉德,《阴影线》, 纽约: 哈佛大学出版社,1985节录.

sentences.en: Find out more: Read an excerpt.
sentences.cn: 了解更多详情: 读一摘录.

sentences.en: I've seen a short excerpt from the film on television.
sentences.cn: 我在电视上看过这部影片的片段.

sentences.en: In the following excerpt, James describes the pragmatic theory of truth.
sentences.cn: 在下面选文中, 詹姆士阐述了实用主义的真理理论.

sentences.en: Read an excerpt here or isit the Web site.
Run that excerpt back to the beginning and replay it in slow motion.
sentences.cn: 把录像片倒到头,然后慢放.

sentences.en: The following excerpt is from a paper by M. W. A. Provis.
sentences.cn: 下面是M.W. A. 普罗维斯的报告中的一段摘录.

sentences.en: The following excerpt is from a W. A. Provis.
sentences.cn: 下面是W. A. 普罗维斯的报告中的一段摘录.

sentences.en: The passage is an excerpt from my recent novel.
sentences.cn: 这段话是从我最近一本小说中选录的.

sentences.en: This is an excerpt from a novel.
To reproduce or reprint ( an article or excerpt ).
sentences.cn: 重印,翻印复制或重新印行 ( 文章或摘录 )

sentences.en: You can excerpt passages from a book.
sentences.cn: 你可以从一本书中摘录几段。

trans.tran_en: a short piece taken from a book, poem, piece of music etc
